Text:
Classification: Scripted
Genre: Drama
Status: New Series
Network: Sundance ( USA)
Airs: Mondays at 10:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: March 18, 2013
Episode Order: 7

A twelve-year-old girl who is five months pregnant is found standing chest deep in a frozen lake and refuses to say who the baby's father is. After she suddenly disappears Robin Griffin finds herself being tested to the limits as she tries to investigate the case.
